<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Furious Grab](/Feats.aspx?ID=5856) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=813" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=680" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 82 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Requirements**
Your last action was a successful [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306), and either you have a hand free or your Strike used a weapon with the [grapple trait](/Traits.aspx?ID=619).

</column>

---

You grab your foe while it's distracted by your attack. The enemy you hit becomes grabbed by you, as if you had succeeded at an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=2376) it.
